description:
At War Solution your calculation and logical thinking skills will be put to the test to solve puzzles and destroy enemies, but don't think that just being quick to solve puzzles to win the challenge, you will often have to equip yourself better or plot combat strategies to be able to win.

The time has come to challenge yourself! Can you win this war?
Boosters

 - Creates a shield protecting your machine from attack, against the opponent's next attack.

 - For 8 seconds your attack will directly hit the enemy tower.
Zoeiras

 - For 8 seconds your enemy's attack is blocked.

 - Removes the ‘booster’ and ‘bullshit’ that the opponent has accumulated. (Exclusive mode in combat mode)

Have fun in 5 unmissable game modes:

  Save the Cerebino Kingdom from collapse, facing increasingly challenging enemy kingdoms.

 - Destroy the enemy tower before time runs out or cry in the rubble of your tower.

 - Great place to train, here you will face random battles with random difficulties.

 - This game mode is for the strong! All your skill and agility will be put to the test. Did you face it?

 - Challenge your friends and family to a fight. Who will win this duel?

Accumulate "Neurons" and "Gold" to purchase new machines, towers, etc.

In War Solution, each Attack and Tower Machine has its own attributes that make all the difference in a fight where every second counts. In addition, some Attack Machines and Towers may have special abilities.
name: War Solution - Casual Math Game
